solution_line_template: There are {blue_balls} blue x {red_to_blue_ratio} red/blue = <<{blue_balls}*{red_to_blue_ratio}={red_balls}>>{red_balls} red balls.
The total number of blue and red balls is {blue_balls} blue + {red_balls} red = <<{blue_balls}+{red_balls}={blue_and_red_total}>>{blue_and_red_total} balls
There are {total_balls} balls - {blue_and_red_total} balls = <<{total_balls}-{blue_and_red_total}={green_balls}>>{green_balls} green balls.
